name: Harvard Graphics DOS Template File
summary: Learn about .TP3 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: TP3 files were created in older versions of Harvard Graphics software.

description: Template file used by Harvard Graphics presentation software; contains a slide, or chart, template with header, footer, background image, and font preferences; used for establishing a common theme for all slides within a presentation or across presentations.
